name: Size
title: CS Tumor Size
notes: **Note**:  Code the specific tumor size as stated in the medical record.  Use code 992, 994, or 995 if the physician's statement about T value is the ONLY information available about the size of the tumor. (Refer to the CS Extension table for instructions on coding extension.)
rows: Microscopic focus or foci only and no size of focus given

Described as "less than 2 cm," or "greater than 1 cm," or "between 1 cm and 2 cm"

Stated as T1 with no other information on size
Described as "less than 3 cm," or "greater than 2 cm," or "between 2 cm and 3 cm"

Described as "less than 4 cm," or "greater than 3 cm," or "between 3 cm and 4 cm"

Stated as T2 with no other information on size

Described as "less than 5 cm," or "greater than 4 cm," or "between 4 cm and 5 cm"

Stated as T3 with no other information on size

Unknown; size not stated
Size of tumor cannot be assessed
Not documented in patient record
